------------------------------------

Dixit maxime : "Here the Hold node implements a mod2 counter, and the Equal nodes allow us to switch between two different oscillators."

I used this fact to do a fast (400hz) switch between 2 sines (A&B) nodes. One of them (A) is detuned using a pitch sensitive osc. But the resulting addition has too many highs. So, I had to slide the Equal ADSR factor.

The rest is a bit of ADSR, a lot of 2 channels distortion with a pitch sensitive CO Filter, additive short delays (0.03) for sound enhancement and stereo delay [+ a 0.25 cosmetic delay.]

Enjoy,

(a or not
